metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12212 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: When FreeImage 3.18.0 reads a special JXR file, the StreamCalcIFDSize function of JXRMeta.c repeatedly calls itself due to improper processing of the file, eventually causing stack exhaustion. An attacker can achieve a remote denial of service attack by sending a specially constructed file.

notes.Note: ebarretto> No fix available as of 2019-09-06.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-09-06').
